author: senh
title: ‘We respect the ghosts’: A spirited cider-tasting guide to Adams County, Pa.
text:
Portland Oregonian , Monday - 10/19/2015 - 08:00 AM 
The larger U. S. airports have special security lines for passengers who have pre-check noted on their boarding passes. The lines are shorter and move more quickly because pre-approved passengers do not need to take off shoes, etc.
